name: video_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_v3_alternative.
Tool description: Get data similar to YouTube Data API v3 from this API. Check latest version: [YT-API](https://rapidapi.com/ytjar/api/yt-api)
API description: Retrieve details of a YouTube video using its ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the YouTube video to retrieve details for.

x_cachebypass.description: The cache bypass parameter; if provided, it must be set to '1'. Defaults to None.
